mapper.insert: insert into quan_ticker (id, exchange_id, status, ts, ch, tick_id, amount, count, open, close, low, high, vol, bid_price, bid_amount, ask_price, ask__amount, date_update, ticker_type) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{exchangeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ts,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{ch,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tickId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{amount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{count,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{open,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{close,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{low,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{high,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{vol,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{bidPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{bidAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{askPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{askAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{dateUpdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{tickerType,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select id, exchange_id, status, ts, ch, tick_id, amount, count, open, close, low, high, vol, bid_price, bid_amount, ask_price, ask__amount, date_update, ticker_type from quan_ticker
